page.title: 11Maiden Castle's Future
page.content: The idea of The English Heritage developing Maiden Castle has brought a lot of opposition. Some say it would completely spoil the scenery of the monument which should remain as it has for hundreds of years. Many of the local residents have enjoyed taking their dogs for walks and picnicing and deplore the idea of possibly having to pay to visit Maiden Castle. Others say that many tourists would cause the ramparts to erode and roads would be congested. However many think that it is a great plan and would bring more visitors and employment to the area. Also it would be good to let others discover this unique hill fort and learn its history. There will be more debate and whatever the outcome lets hope it will be the best for Maiden Castle.
